altername_name: Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition
Play TV 3 Street Fighter II' Plus
Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition
Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition
name: Play TV Legends Street Fighter 2
overview: The Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition, known as the Play TV Legends Street Fighter 2[4] in the US and the Mega Drive Play TV 3 (メガドライブ プレイTV 3) in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica. The system contains Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition and the Mega Drive version of Ghouls'n Ghosts built-in. It also comes with two controllers.
